name.ja: サイドパネル画像ダウンロード
name.vi: Tải xuống hình ảnh từ thanh bên

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Easy download any page images from the side panel
short.da: Einfaches Herunterladen von Bildern von jeder Seite über das Seitenpanel
short.fr: Téléchargez facilement des images de n'importe quelle page via le panneau latéral
short.ja: サイドパネルから簡単にページの画像をダウンロード
short.vi: Dễ dàng tải xuống hình ảnh từ bất kỳ trang nào thông qua thanh bên
short.zh_CN: 从侧边栏轻松下载任何页面的图片
short.zh_TW: 從側邊欄輕鬆下載任何頁面的圖片

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Side Image Downloader is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension that helps you quickly download images from any webpage directly from a convenient side panel. Whether you’re browsing for inspiration, gathering images for a project, or just saving pictures you like, Side Image Downloader streamlines the process with a simple, intuitive interface.

Key Features:

Effortless Image Downloading: Access and download images from any webpage without leaving the browser.
Search by Image URL or Alt Text: Quickly find specific images by searching through their URLs or alt text.
Batch Downloading: Select multiple images and download them all at once with a single click.
Download All Images: Download all images on a webpage instantly with the "Download All" feature.
Image Sorting: Sort images by size or width to prioritize your downloads according to your needs.
Side Panel Interface: Manage your downloads from a dedicated side panel that doesn’t disrupt your browsing experience.
Image Preview: Preview images before downloading to ensure you’re getting exactly what you want.
